processingResourceMetaData.name: PropbankGoldReader

configurationParameter.name: PropbankCorpusFile
configurationParameter.description: should point to the propbank data (e.g. propbank-1.0/props.txt).

configurationParameter.name: TreebankCorpusDirectory
configurationParameter.description: Should point to treebank data. The expectation is that the directory provided will have a subdirectory called 'wsj/mrg' such that e.g. 'wsj/mrg/00/wsj_0001.mrg' can be retrieved from the directory given in this parameter.
